attributes.action: buy up the poppy pruduction in Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will give the farmers a market.Give our health services,needed opium.Cut off funds for our enemies.Help to curtail growing resentment in the local community,and help our hearts and minds programme.This will be hard to police,so huge incentives must be added.
Then over time,we can slowly reduce the amount of production to suit our needs, and introduce new farming techniques for the production of people friendly crops.
